text: Unlit redstone torches have an unobtainable item form corresponding to its block ID, which uses the inactive texture. It can be obtained via inventory editors with numeric item ID 75.
Unlit redstone torch items can be obtained from the newly added debug chests, mainly from the 17th slot of the 3rd chest from the left, and the 1st slot of the 7th chest from the left.
Debug chests no longer spawn, preventing unlit redstone torch items from being obtained this way.

Added pick block functionality. This will change the currently selected slot to any containing this otherwise-unobtainable redstone torch item, but will not allow it to be obtained if not already in the hotbar.
Pick Block now returns the actually obtainable redstone torch item.
Unlit redstone torch items can now be obtained in singleplayer worlds via the /give command using the respective numeric ID.
The direct item form of unlit redstone torches has been removed from the game. It can no longer exist as an item in any way, only as a placed block.
Unlit redstone torches probably exist as an item.

texts.text: Item names did not exist prior to Beta 1.0.
